last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: The jury returns its verdict and Anna discovers her fate in court. Craig and Anna are brought face to face once more as part of the judicial process, and shocking new evelations come to light.

name: The Victim
overview: A grieving mother is accused of identifying online the man she believes killed her son. But is he really a notorious child murderer or a tragic victim of mistaken identity?

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A trial begins: on one side a grieving mother and on the other a man accused online of being her son’s killer. But who is the accused and who is the victim?

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Craig prepares for his day in court as threats against him and his family escalate and Rebecca’s doubts about her husband take root. Is he telling her the whole truth?

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: As Anna takes the stand, the strain of the trial threatens to destroy her family. Her search for proof of Eddie J Turner’s identity continues, but what will she do if she gets it?

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The jury returns its verdict and Anna discovers her fate in court. Craig and Anna are brought face to face once more as part of the judicial process, and shocking new evelations come to light.
